title: OPPO A53s 5G (Ink Black, 128 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, USB Cable, Charger, SIM Ejector Tool, Protective Case, Quick Start Guide, Safety Guide
product_specification.Other Display Features: 60 Hz Refresh Rate, 88.7% Screen-to-Body Ratio, Ultra Clear Eyecare Diplay
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Rear Camera Setup: 13MP Main (f/2.2 Aperture, 5P Lens, AF Supported, Open-loop Motor) 2MP Bokeh Camera (f/2.4 Aperture, FOV 89 Degree, 3P Lens, 1.75 mm Focal Length, FF) 2MP Macro Camera (f/2.4 Aperture, FOV 89 Degree, 3P Lens, 1.77 mm Focal Length, FF), Camera Mode: Photo, Video, Night, Expert, Panoramic, Portrait, Time-lapse, Slow-motion, Text Scanner, Extra HD, AI ID Photo, Macro and Scan, Photo Editing Options: Crop and Rotate, Adjust, Filter, Markup, Text, Mosaic, Beautify, Sticker, Blur, Eraser
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 8MP Front Camera (f/2.0 Aperture, FOV 79 Degree, 5P Lens, Focal Length: 2.75 mm), Camera Mode: Photo, Video, Panoramic, Portrait, Night, Time-lapse and AI ID Photo
product_specification.Other Features: UFS 2.2 ROM (at 2 Lanes HS-Gear3), Side Fingerprint Unlock, Maximum OTG Storage 2TB, Dual-Mode 5G
product_specification.Warranty Summary: Brand Warranty of 1 Year Available for Mobile Including Battery and 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.High-speed and Powerful Smartphone: The OPPO A53s 5G is powered by an MTK Dimensity 700 processor and up to 8 GB of RAM for smooth functioning. Also, it features Dual-SIM 5G facility and a 5000 mAh battery for uninterrupted connectivity and entertainment.
product_description.MTK Dimensity 700 and Dual-SIM 5G: The MTK Dimensity 700 5G chip lets you use two 5G SIM cards at the same time.
product_description.6 GB/8 GB of RAM with 128 GB of ROM: You can enjoy a fast app launch, reduced lag, and multiple apps running smoothly in the background on this OPPO smartphone. It has a RAM-expansion feature that re-optimises the unused RAM to improve the performance of this smartphone.
product_description.5000 mAh Battery: The battery of this smartphone can deliver up to 17.74 hours of video playback time, and up to 19.26 hours of time on Instagram.
product_description.AI Triple Camera: This smartphone comes with an AI main camera, 4 cm macro lens, and a portrait lens to capture every beautiful moment at parties, with your family and friends, and of your pet.
product_description.Ultra Clear 108 MP Image: This smartphone can construct photos in 108 MP to capture clear and detailed images.
product_description.AI Beautification: The intelligent and comprehensive beauty effects of this smartphone improve the quality of your photos.
product_description.Ultra Night Selfie: Even at night and in dark places, you can take beautiful photos using this smartphone.
product_description.AI Scene Recognition: The automatic 22 scene recognition, tone algorithms, and color mapping let you click beautiful photos of everything around you.
product_description.Macro Mode: Using this mode, you can capture the smallest details of various subjects.
product_description.Ultra Clear Eye Care Display: The All-day AI Comfort protects your eyes during days as well as nights. The Premier 4096 Grade Accurate Dimming on the 16.55-cm display ensures that your eyes are taken care of.
product_description.Stunning and Convenient: This smartphone is about 8.4 mm thick, weighs about 189 g, and has a 20:9 screen ratio. Also, it has a Fingerprint Unlock feature that lets you unlock this device in about 0.3 second.
product_description.ColorOS 11.1: This operating system features a System Booster that has customized algorithms to deliver impressive speed for a smooth operation.
product_description.Remote Access: Using this feature, you and someone else can watch the same video and photo simultaneously.
product_description.FlexDrop: This feature lets you switch between tasks and windows smoothly.
product_description.Simple Mode: This mode offers easy-to-read text and icons.

Writing this review after 3 months of use.
Camara: Takes excellent shots in near subjects😊 but for longer subjects camara is below avg😕.
Battery: Initially Battery is excellent I got avg 14hrs SOT😀😲 , Now im getting 10hrs SOT😔😭. I didn't get 4hrs gone with in 3 months of use and 2 Android updates(security patch). I guess via update they're degrading battery.😠
Display: It's a Decent job from Oppo not a HD Screen or Full HD Screen but it stands between HD and FHD that is HD+🤗.
Performance: I never faced any lag or heating issue😬 ( I never played any game too but I do photo editing video editing).
Call connection: It is Good 😊, where ever you go, you won't face any call drops.
Sensors: All sensors are working fine.🤤
Conclusion: If you're not a Camera lover then you can blindly go for it. I'll use for multimedia consumption, Editing, Small photography, whether checking, speed tracker using gps and what not even for Trading with big charts also use split screen.
💪👑💪
